content.query:
USE Retail;
GO

-- FACT TABLES

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.vw_fact_order_products
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://stretaildata123.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/fact_order_products/',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS x;
GO


CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.vw_fact_orders
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://stretaildata123.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/fact_orders/',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS x;
GO


-- DIMENSION TABLES

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.vw_dim_product
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://stretaildata123.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/dim_product/',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS x;
GO


CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.vw_dim_customer
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://stretaildata123.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/dim_customer/',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS x;
GO


CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.vw_dim_department
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://stretaildata123.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/dim_department/',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS x;
GO


CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.vw_dim_aisle
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://stretaildata123.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/dim_aisle/',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS x;
GO


CREATE OR ALTER VIEW dbo.vw_dim_date
AS
SELECT *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://stretaildata123.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/dim_date/',
    FORMAT = 'DELTA'
) AS x;
GO
